settings.product_body:
Our hybrid mattress combines the adaptive zoning technology of memory foam and the long-lasting support of pocket springs. Our Active Cooling Technology (ACT) works to promote the deep sleep phase. 

The deep sleep phase is where your body gets to recover the most, and body temperature needs to drop by at least 1.5°C to fall into this phase. Millions of graphite particles in the foam of our Active Cooling Technology (ACT)  take away excess heat in record time, making you feel 2°C cooler for an experience of deep, restorative slumber.

To find the perfect mattress for you, see our Mattress Size Guide.

settings.question: Materials and Care
settings.answer:
Our mattress core is made of special proprietary cooling and adaptable foams, pressure-relieving visco-elastic memory foam, and an optimized pocket spring core. All sizes have a thickness of 11 inches. Other materials include an upper size made of 76% polyester and 23% lyocell 1% elastane, and an underside made of 87% polyester 13% polypropylene.

To clean the mattress cover, open the zip and separate the top from the bottom part, and wash at a temperature below 104°F. Refrain from dry washing, bleaching, and ironing. Gently and mildly wet clean with Perchlorethylene, if possible.

settings.mattress_body:
The climate-regulating mattress cover is breathable, washable, and lightweight.

Our innovative graphite-infused foam as our Active Cooling Technology ensures an extended deep sleep phase through optimal temperature regulation due to the heat-dissipating and touch-sensitive graphite particles.

The memory foam layer distributes pressure evenly allowing the mattress to adapt to your body's individual contours.

The 300+ pocket spring core of our mattress ensures dynamic adaptation to your body and high air permeability.

The HRX foam layer features zoning and cutting technology for counter-pressure, alignment, and support.

settings.question: How does the 100-night trial work?
settings.answer: Take your time when choosing a mattress and deciding if everything about it is right for you. Our risk-free trials gives you 100 nights to relax and enjoy. We also guarantee that the performance characteristics of Emma mattresses will remain undiminished for many years.

settings.question: What are the shipping and return details?
settings.answer:
We work with UPS and FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door. Free returns are guaranteed if you must return your purchase for any reason, and our customer service will take care of everything.

For customers purchasing a mattress to be delivered in the state of California, you can reach out to our Customer Service team at support@emma-mattress.com to arrange for the collection of your old mattress.

settings.question: What is the warranty of an Emma mattress?
settings.answer: Every mattress comes with a 10-year guaranteed warranty.  Free returns are guaranteed if you must return your purchase for any reason, and our customer service will take care of everything. Our team is reachable through support@emma-mattress.com and we got you covered.

settings.question: Are Emma mattresses compatible with adjustable bases?
settings.answer: Yes! All of our memory foam and hybrid mattresses are compatible with adjustable bases. Shop our Emma x Ergomotion Power Base here.

settings.question: How firm are Emma mattresses?
settings.answer: We’re on the medium-firm range, meaning our mattresses have the right amount of support to distribute pressure evenly across the mattress. Our mattresses also have a softer top layer foam to adapt to movement and sleeping positions to comfortably hug your body as you sleep through the night.
